Content.Text: Sure! It's time to turn in.

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No, there's still more to do.

<SPEED_FAST>This is the <BLUE>bed</BLUE>. The day will end once I go to
sleep.
<PAGE>
<SPEED_FAST>The time I choose to go to sleep determines
when I'll wake up. If I want to get up early, I
need to go to bed early.

<SPEED_FAST>This is the <GREEN>Food Maker</GREEN>. It can make <BLUE>butter and
yogurt</BLUE> from <BLUE>milk</BLUE> or <BLUE>mayonnaise</BLUE> from <BLUE>eggs</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
<SPEED_FAST>I can also make items that have fruits and herbs
blended together, as well as jam made from
fruit.

<SPEED_FAST>This is the <GREEN>Material Maker</GREEN>. It can make <BLUE>yarn</BLUE> and
<BLUE>cloth</BLUE> from <BLUE>wool</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
<SPEED_FAST>I can then use yarn and cloth to make clothing
and wallpaper.

<SPEED_FAST>This is the <GREEN>Seed Maker</GREEN>. It can make seeds if
<BLUE>crops and mushrooms</BLUE> are fed into it.
<PAGE>
<SPEED_FAST>I can easily make two seeds from one crop or
mushroom.

<SPEED_FAST>This is the <GREEN>Medicine Maker</GREEN>. I can use this to
transform various items into other items to make
life a little easier.

<SPEED_FAST>This is a <GREEN>Powder Maker</GREEN>. It can make <BLUE>rice flour</BLUE>
from <BLUE>rice</BLUE> and regular <BLUE>flour</BLUE> from <BLUE>wheat</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
<SPEED_FAST>If I use flowers and herbs, I can also make
<BLUE>perfumes</BLUE> with this.
There's no space in the bag...
I could put a <BLUE>fish hatchery</BLUE> here.
I don't have any fish or clams.
There's not enough space for that.
There's too much; let's dial it back a little.
There's no point in giving any more.
I don't have space to save even one thing.

<SPEED_IMME>Name of <MOJI1>: <BLUE><MOJI0></BLUE>
Do you want to change the name?

<SPEED_FAST>This is the <BLUE>kitchen</BLUE>. I can make meals here from
any recipes I have.

<SPEED_IMME><BLUE><MOJI0></BLUE> has been set up.
What shall I do?
There's no place to store the current sun!
I can't exchange for that sun.
<SPEED_IMME>Should I put the bouquet in here?

The bouquet is a nice touch. It looks great! ♪
I'll switch it out if I feel it needs a change.
There are no animals bearing young right now.
She's starting to look more like a mom.

<SPEED_IMME>Name of <MOJI1>: <GREEN><MOJI0></GREEN>
Do you want to change the name?
Equip the <BLUE>Watering Can</BLUE> and draw water.

<SPEED_IMME>At the field over this way, you can raise <BLUE>tea, fruit
trees and spices</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
<SPEED_IMME><RED>Note: You cannot raise anything without the
guild's permission!</RED>

<SPEED_IMME>At the field over this way, you can raise
<BLUE>mushrooms, beehives, and tall structures</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
<SPEED_IMME><RED>Note: You cannot raise anything without the
guild's permission!</RED>

<SPEED_IMME>At the field over this way, you can raise <BLUE>root
veggies and plants</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
<SPEED_IMME><RED>Note: You cannot raise anything without the
guild's permission!</RED>

<SPEED_IMME>At the field over this way, you can raise <BLUE>rice and
wheat</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
<SPEED_IMME><RED>Note: You cannot raise anything without the
guild's permission!</RED>

It might be a little too early.
Breakfast is at <BLUE>6:00</BLUE>.

It might be a little too early.
Lunch is at <BLUE>12:00</BLUE>.

It might be a little too early.
Dinner is at <BLUE>19:00</BLUE>.

It might be a little too early.
Breakfast is at <BLUE>6:00</BLUE>.

I won't be able to eat
<MOJI0> with the family
today.

<SPEED_FAST>I can eat if I examine the <BLUE>Table</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
<SPEED_FAST>Just choose <RED>Eat</RED>, then select someone to prepare
the food.
I can decorate this by putting in a <BLUE>bouquet</BLUE>.

<CANCEL_SELECT>
Don't get in the hot spring

<SPEED_FAST>I can store mass amounts of insects and items
in the <BLUE>storage box</BLUE>.

<SPEED_FAST>I can store mass amounts of food
in the <BLUE>fridge</BLUE>.

<SPEED_FAST>I can store mass amounts of tools and seeds in
the <BLUE>tool box</BLUE>.

<SPEED_FAST>I can store mass amounts of materials in the
<BLUE>material bin</BLUE>.

<SPEED_FAST>I can look up various upcoming events via the
<BLUE>calendar</BLUE>.
It doesn't seem to be usable right now.
I can't call the horse when I'm on a walk.
Call the horse and go to town
Call the horse and go to the Trade Depot

<CANCEL_SELECT>
Let's call the whole thing off
<SPEED_IMME>Should I give it the carrot from my bag?

<SPEED_IMME>What should I do?
<RED>*If I keep a carrot in my bag, it'll make traveling
to town much easier.</RED>
Equip a <BLUE>fishing rod</BLUE> if you wish to go fishing.

<SPEED_IMME>[General Store]
Days of Operation:  <BLUE>Mon-Sat</BLUE>
Hours of Operation: <BLUE>9:00-18:00</BLUE>

<SPEED_IMME>[Inn]
Days of Operation:  <BLUE>Mon-Sat</BLUE>
Hours of Operation: <BLUE>8:00-18:00</BLUE>

<SPEED_IMME>[Guild]
Days of Operation:  <BLUE>Sun-Sat</BLUE>
Hours of Operation: <BLUE>9:00-17:00</BLUE>
<PAGE>
<SPEED_IMME>[Clinic] *Back Counter
Days of Operation:  <BLUE>Sun-Sat</BLUE>
Hours of Operation: <BLUE>9:00-17:30</BLUE>

<SPEED_IMME>[Restaurant]
Days of Operation:  <BLUE>Sun-Sat *Wed Closed</BLUE>
Hours of Operation: <BLUE>11:00-21:30</BLUE>

<SPEED_IMME>[Carpenter]
Days of Operation:  <BLUE>Mon-Sat</BLUE>
Hours of Operation: <BLUE>8:00-18:00</BLUE>

<SPEED_IMME>[Antique Shop]
Days of Operation:  <BLUE>Tues, Wed, Fri, Sun</BLUE>
Hours of Operation: <BLUE>9:00-19:00</BLUE>

<SPEED_IMME>[Doctor's Office]
Days of Operation:  <BLUE>Mon-Sat</BLUE>
Hours of Operation: <BLUE>9:00-17:30</BLUE>
Let's put food in the <GREEN>feeding area</GREEN>.
My bag is already filled to bursting.
There's nothing here that stands out.
Equip the <BLUE>hammer</BLUE> and take a swing!

Place a seasonal sun here. This will change the
season inside the room.
There's not enough space in my bag for it.
There are no animals bearing young right now.
She's starting to look more like a mom.
If I place the <BLUE>egg</BLUE> here, it should incubate.
It's closed. I really shouldn't ring the bell.
Today is a <RED>holiday</RED>. I really shouldn't ring the bell.

Eda...
I'm taking good care of your farmland.
I should pay my respects with a <BLUE>bouquet</BLUE>.
I should remove my equipment first.

<SPEED_FAST>This is my <BLUE>bookshelf</BLUE>. I can look up useful
information here.
<PAGE>
<SPEED_FAST>The more new things I experience, the more
books there will be on the shelf.
<PAGE>
Note: More information can also be found in the
e-manual. Why not take a look sometime?

<SPEED_FAST>This is my <BLUE>closet</BLUE>. I can store my clothes and
accessories here.
<PAGE>
<SPEED_FAST>When I make new clothes and accessories, I can
also come here to change.

<SPEED_FAST>This is my <BLUE>calendar</BLUE>. I can look up events and
birthdays with this.
<PAGE>
<SPEED_FAST>There will constantly be new events and new
people to remember, so I'd best check it from
time to time.

<SPEED_FAST>This is my <BLUE>toolbox</BLUE>. I can store sickles, hoes,
and other various tools here.
<PAGE>
<SPEED_FAST>Unused tools can be tossed into the toolbox and
saved for another time.

<SPEED_FAST>This is my special <BLUE>storage box</BLUE>. I can store
insects and flowers here.
<PAGE>
<SPEED_FAST>Insects and flowers that are taking up too much
space in my bag can be dropped off here.

<SPEED_FAST>This is my <BLUE>fridge</BLUE>. I can store food, mushrooms,
and other edibles here.
<PAGE>
<SPEED_FAST>If there's food that's taking up too much space
in my bag, I can stash it in the fridge.

<SPEED_FAST>This is the <BLUE>mailbox</BLUE>. New product flyers and
postcards go here.
<PAGE>
<SPEED_FAST>Not a lot can fit in here, though, so please check
back frequently!

<SPEED_FAST>This is the <GREEN>fodder bin</GREEN>. I can dispense <BLUE>fodder</BLUE>
from the storage box here.
<PAGE>
<SPEED_FAST>Make sure to check the storage box regularly so
you don't run out of fodder!

<SPEED_FAST>This is the <GREEN>treat bin</GREEN>. I can dispense treats from
the storage box here.
<PAGE>
<SPEED_FAST>There are different kinds of treats and each one
has a different dispenser.
<PAGE>
<SPEED_FAST>Make sure to check the storage box regularly,
however, so you don't run out of treats!

<SPEED_FAST>This is the <GREEN>maternity area</GREEN>. Animals bearing
young should be housed here.
<PAGE>
<SPEED_FAST>Animals in the maternity area do not need to be
fed, though they will need to be watched
carefully until their young are born.

<SPEED_FAST>This is the <GREEN>feeding area</GREEN>. <BLUE>Fodder</BLUE> can be tossed in
here and livestock animals will come by to eat it.
<PAGE>
<SPEED_FAST>When I throw fodder in here, I need to be sure I
actually get it all in!

<SPEED_FAST>This is the <GREEN>animal notebook</GREEN>. I can check up on
animal names and conditions with this.
<PAGE>
<SPEED_FAST>Make sure to read it inside and out with some
regularity, because these animals are dependent
on you!

<SPEED_FAST>This is the <GREEN>chicken feed bin</GREEN>. I can dispense
<BLUE>chicken feed</BLUE> from the storage box here.
<PAGE>
<SPEED_FAST>Make sure to check the storage box regularly,
however, so you don't run out of feed!

<SPEED_FAST>This is the <GREEN>rabbit feed bin</GREEN>. I can dispense <BLUE>rabbit
feed</BLUE> from the storage box here.
<PAGE>
<SPEED_FAST>Make sure to check the storage box regularly,
however, so you don't run out of rabbit feed!

<SPEED_FAST>This is the <GREEN>treat bin</GREEN>. I can dispense treats from
the storage box here.
<PAGE>
<SPEED_FAST>Make sure to check the storage box regularly,
however, so you don't run out of treats!

<SPEED_FAST>This is the <GREEN>incubator</GREEN>. I can leave an egg here
and a chick will be born within a few days.
<PAGE>
<SPEED_FAST>I should never leave any fertilized eggs
unattended for very long, though! I need to
check on them regularly.

<SPEED_FAST>This is the <GREEN>chicken feeding area</GREEN>. <BLUE>Chicken feed</BLUE>
can be tossed in here and chickens will come
by to eat it.
<PAGE>
<SPEED_FAST>When I throw feed in here, however, I need to be
sure I actually got it all in!

<SPEED_FAST>This is my <GREEN>animal notebook</GREEN>. I can check up on
animal names and conditions with this.
<PAGE>
<SPEED_FAST>Make sure to read it inside and out with some
regularity, because these animals are dependent
on you!

<SPEED_FAST>This is the <GREEN>pet food slot</GREEN>. I can dispense <BLUE>pet food</BLUE>
from the storage box here.
<PAGE>
<SPEED_FAST>Make sure to check the storage box regularly,
however, so you don't run out of food!

<SPEED_FAST>This is the <GREEN>pet feeder</GREEN>. <BLUE>Pet food</BLUE> can be tossed in
here and pets will come by to eat it.
<PAGE>
<SPEED_FAST>When I throw fodder in here, however, I need to
be sure I actually got it all in!

<SPEED_FAST>This is my <GREEN>animal notebook</GREEN>. I can check up on
animal names and conditions with this.
<PAGE>
<SPEED_FAST>Make sure to read it inside and out with some
regularity, because these animals are dependent
on you!

<SPEED_FAST>This is my <GREEN>accessory work table</GREEN>. I can use
various materials here to build accessories.
<PAGE>
<SPEED_FAST>To build new accessories, I just need to obtain
blueprints.

<SPEED_FAST>This is my <GREEN>sewing machine</GREEN>. I can make clothing
from cloth with this.

<SPEED_FAST>This is my <GREEN>loom</GREEN>. I can make cloth from dyed
yarn with this.

<SPEED_FAST>This is my <GREEN>spinning wheel</GREEN>. I can turn wool, hair,
and fur into yarn with this.

<SPEED_FAST>This is my <GREEN>item storage</GREEN>. I can take out items I've
saved through here.

<SPEED_FAST>These are my <GREEN>dyeing pots</GREEN>. I can dye balls of yarn
with these.

<SPEED_FAST>This is my <GREEN>potter's wheel</GREEN>. I can make pottery out
of soil products here.

<SPEED_FAST>This is my <GREEN>kiln</GREEN>. I can fire up pottery that I've
made here, though there's a limit to the number
of items that can fired.

<SPEED_FAST>This is my <GREEN>coloring table</GREEN>. I can add color to my
fired pottery with this.

<SPEED_FAST>This is my <GREEN>wine press</GREEN>. I can use this to squeeze
the juice out of various fruits.

<SPEED_FAST>This is my <GREEN>wine cask</GREEN>. I can use this to ferment
any juice I've squeezed and make it into wine.

<SPEED_FAST>This is my <GREEN>crop dryer</GREEN>. It's a machine that makes
it easier to remove seeds from crops.

<SPEED_FAST>This is my <GREEN>threshing machine</GREEN>. It's a machine
that removes seeds from dried crops.

<SPEED_FAST>This is my <GREEN>fertilizer maker</GREEN>. It's a machine that
processes fertilizer.

<SPEED_FAST>This is my <GREEN>vat</GREEN>. I can make spices and
seasonings with this, such as miso.

<SPEED_FAST>This is my <GREEN>spice maker</GREEN>. I can grind and squeeze
ingredients in this to make spices.

<SPEED_FAST>This is my <GREEN>grinder</GREEN>. I can use this to make flour
from wheat.

<SPEED_FAST>This is my <GREEN>curdling pot</GREEN>. I can make cheese in
this by heating up milk.

<SPEED_FAST>This is my <GREEN>maturing rack</GREEN>. This is where I leave
cheese to age and mature.

<SPEED_FAST>This is my <GREEN>churn</GREEN>. I can make mayonnaise
and yogurt with this.

<SPEED_FAST>This is a <GREEN>horseback riding area</GREEN>. I can call my
<BLUE>horse</BLUE> and go riding from here.
I shouldn't be in the water during a hurricane.
Water is dangerous during a blizzard.
Let's hold off until the <RED>fishing contest</RED> is over.
I'm <RED>walking</RED> right now. Let's save that for later.
I can't sit from this side.
It's empty. Let's add food to the <BLUE>storage box</BLUE>.
There's plenty of food. Not to worry. ♪

That was soooo relaxing! Baths sure do feel
good...

Phew, that felt great. Now, then, what should I
do next?

Phew, that felt good...but I've already bathed, so
just dipping a toe was enough for now.

Hmm...I just went. I'll use it again when the urge
returns.
<SPEED_IMME>Should I get in the hot spring?

That was soooo relaxing! Hot springs sure do
feel good...

Phew, that felt good...but I've already soaked, so
just dipping a toe was enough for now.

It's already this late? If I'm going to sleep, I need
to do it soon or forever hold my peace!
<SPEED_IMME>Do you want to fly by using the <BLUE>cannon</BLUE>?
Observe! See how beautifully it extinguishes!
A <BLUE>bouquet</BLUE> would look great in here!

There's no space in my bag for a <BLUE>bouquet</BLUE> right
now.
They're making preparations. I can't get through.

<SPEED_IMME>There's a profit of <BLUE><MOJI0>G</BLUE> waiting here to
be claimed. Should I claim it?
I'll hold off because of the weather.
